findings.title: Code not following concise way and lacking informative checks
findings.description: The code can be more informative and secure by implementing additional checks and modifier usage, with improved variable naming conventions.

findings.title: Insecure variable naming conventions
findings.description: The use of variables and naming conventions can be minimized

findings.title: No locking function in case of loss or security issue
findings.description: The contract lacks a mechanism to lock functionality in response to security issues or losses.
